meanings.sent1: The collagenases in our body help in breaking down collagen for tissue repair.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the effects of collagenases on skin aging.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous collagenases decided to break down all the collagen in the body just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like collagenases, slowly breaking down the strong bond between them.
meanings.sent5: The powerful collagenases worked tirelessly to break down the tough collagen fibers.

meanings.sent1: Doctors use collagenases to target and degrade excess collagen in scar tissue.
meanings.sent2: Exposure to UV radiation can lead to the breakdown of collagen by collagenases.
meanings.sent3: The collagenases at the party were the life of the event, degrading any collagen they came across.
meanings.sent4: Time can be like collagenases, slowly degrading our youthful collagen stores.
meanings.sent5: The collagenases acted like little workers, diligently degrading the collagen structure.

meanings.sent1: Certain foods contain collagenases that can help in the digestion of collagen-rich foods.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often rely on collagenases to aid in the breakdown of collagen for muscle repair.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient was collagenases, which magically tenderized the tough collagen in the meat.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against aging, collagenases are the warriors that hydrolyze the collagen enemies.
meanings.sent5: The body's natural collagenases work like tiny scissors, cutting and hydrolyzing collagen as needed.
